channel.title: Development on Mostly Information (theory)

item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: The whole ML/AI/Deep Learning thing After reading StJohn Deakin’s excellent take on all things AI, I wanted to get down where I stand on the whole thing! Deep Learning Only suits certain large data problems (vision/speech). Only suits problems where manipulation of non-platonic concepts prevail (no symbolic reality… although some work has been done on this). Largely empirical (other than when Bayes is applied). This gung-ho is refreshing. Researchers it attracts are low grade scientists (like me), compared to, say, biologists.
